components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay and Failure to TNM Malawi

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays and failure when sending messages to TNM Malawi. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delay and Failure to TNM Malawi. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 August 2023 at 2:00 PDT until 01 August 2023 at 4:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: South Korea SMS Carrier Maintenance - LG U+

incident_updates.body:
The LG U+ network in South Korea is conducting a planned maintenance from 1 August 2023 at 7:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to LG U+ South Korea handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
1 August 2023 at 7:00 PDT until 1 August 2023 at 13:00 PDT
8 August 2023 at 8:00 PDT until 8 August 2023 at 13:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 8:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 13:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 02 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 31 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 03 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
09 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 10 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
16 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 17 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
23 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 24 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
30 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 31 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 August 2023 at 20:59 PDT until 03 August 2023 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carrier: Bell Canada

Impacted Products:
Lookup Identity Match
Verify Silent Network Auth

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 August 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 06 August 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match and Verify Silent Network Authentication

incident_updates.body: The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting a planned maintenance from 3 August 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 3 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Vodafone Egypt handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany and Austria Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 7 August 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 7 August 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Germany and Austria phone numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT

22 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT

28 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 28 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
28 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 28 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT

29 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
29 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT

04 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 04 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT

05 September 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 05 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT

11 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.
